bibl.title: An Inscribed Architectural Fragment from Middle Egypt Concerning the Roman Imperial Quarries.
Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993
bibl.author: COCKLE, Walter E. H.

bibl.note: A version of this paper was presented at the 21. Internationaler Papyrologenkongress-Berlin on 18.08.95. - Limestone block photographed outside the Egyptian Antiquities Organisation store at Hermopolis Magna (El-Ashmunein) in 1985. The text in Latin, written with a brush, attests a building serving the use of the tabularii for Mons Porphyrites in the Eastern Desert.
